plot: A double homicide leads Nick (David Giuntoli) and Hank (Russell Hornsby) to a traveling carnival where the performers are not what they seem. To get a better understanding of what's going on behind the scenes Monroe (Silas Weir Mitchell) and Rosalee (Bree Turner) go undercover. On the wedding front, Monroe has a really important question for Nick. In Austria, an invaluable member of the Resistance makes the ultimate sacrifice to help Adalind (Claire Coffee).—Anonymous

Nick and Wu, just back on duty, examine the bloody double killing of two vixens who lured to their home and taunted insufferably Max, a feral who is whipped daily to trigger his transformation as a circus act to be 'fatally shot' on stage. Nick's delight to be asked as Monroe's best man quickly turns into literal nightmares when he realizes the effect a Grimm can have on a hall filled with Wesens. Sebastien sacrifices himself so the resistance can bring Adalinde and the royal baby to safety during prince-usurper Victor's personally lead chase.—KGF Vissers
